headline: DaVita’s 20-Year Fortune Streak And What It Signals For Investors
summary: DaVita (NYSE:DVA) has been named to Fortune's World's Most Admired Companies list for the 20th consecutive year. The company ranked third in its category, with recognition tied to culture, clinical focus, and social responsibility. This milestone reflects long running external recognition of DaVita's employer brand and approach to patient care. For investors watching NYSE:DVA, this recognition arrives with the stock at a share price of $152.54 and multi year returns of 88.4% over 3 years...
